text: Heather Watson won in the final 6–4, 6–1 against Yana Buchina. ==Seeds== # Kristina Mladenovic (First Round) # Noppawan Lertcheewakarn (Quarterfinals) # Tímea Babos (Second Round) # Sloane Stephens (Third Round) # Ajla Tomljanović (Second Round) # Silvia Njirić (Third Round) # Lauren Embree (Second Round) # Christina McHale (Withdrew) 9.
